mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.title as title, a.content as content, b.Admin_name as messagername, CONVERT(varchar, a.messagetime,120) as messagetime from tower_message a LEFT JOIN tower_admin b on a.messager = b.id where a.ID = #{ID}
mapper.update: update tower_message set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, messagetime=GETDATE() where ID = #{id};
